value.html: Simplifier \(\int_{t=0}^{\sin^2x} \Arcsin\sqrt t\,d t + \int_{t=0}^{\cos^2x} \Arccos\sqrt t\,d t\).

value.latex:
$f$ est paire, $\pi$-périodique. $f'(x) = 0$ pour $0 \le x \le \frac \pi2$
$ \Rightarrow  f(x) = f(\pi/4) = \frac \pi4$.
value.html: \(f\) est paire, \(\pi\)-périodique. \(f'(x) = 0\) pour \(0 \le x \le \frac \pi2\) \(\Rightarrow f(x) = f(\pi/4) = \frac \pi4\).

preview: Simplifier \(\int_{t=0}^{\sin^2x} \Arcsin\sqrt t\,d t + \int_{t=0}^{\cos^2x} \Arccos\sqrt t\,d t\).
